text: The others were all dancing and as Gay drew out a chair and sat down Gavin, without a word, swept Simone on to the floor."It doesn't mean anything," Gay told herself desperately, trying to understand Gavin's point of view and remembering the advice that Larry had given her, while she felt wretched beyond words.
